Mr Muir says, by focusing on five core subjects- dubbed the English Baccalaureate- the Michael Government puts the emphasis on higher-achieving pupils. The problem is that very few students from disadvantaged backgrounds actually take those subjects, they won't be motivated to take them. "Ministers are now incentivising schools to focus their efforts on middle-class children who do well in these subjects. , book by Donald Rumsfeld claims Reviled two-time Defense Secretary Donald Rumsfeld has finally written his memoir. It is titled "Known and Unknown," after a a typically obtuse quote he gave to the press while mismanaging the global war on terrorism. . "We've been talking about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making for a long time," said Eric Schmidt , who joined Google as CEO in 2001. In my clear opinion, Larry Page is ready to lead and I'm excited about working with both him and Sergey Brin for a long time to come.
